appearance.title: Appearance
appearance.description: Customize the look and feel of the application.

uiLanguage.label: Interface Language
uiLanguage.description: Choose the language for the application interface.

aiLanguage.label: AI Interaction Language
aiLanguage.description: Choose the language for interacting with the AI assistant.

aiMode.label: Default AI Mode
aiMode.description: Choose the default behavior for AI interactions.

researchModel.label: Research Model
researchModel.description: Choose the AI model for the 'Deep Research' feature.

aiModelConfig.drawerDescription: Adjust settings for the AI models.
aiModelConfig.defaultModelDescription: Select the default AI model for general use. Paid users can choose more advanced options via Developer Mode.
aiModelConfig.systemPromptPlaceholder: You are an AI assistant that helps with tasks...
aiModelConfig.systemPromptDefaultValue: You are a helpful AI assistant that helps users manage and understand their tasks.

aiLanguageChanged.title: AI Language Changed
aiLanguageChanged.toDutch: AI language has been changed to Dutch
aiLanguageChanged.toEnglish: AI language has been changed to English

errorSavingAiLanguage.title: Error Saving AI Language
errorSavingAiLanguage.description: Could not save AI language preference.

uiLanguageChanged.title: Interface Language Changed
uiLanguageChanged.description: Interface language has been set to {language}.

accountUpdated.title: Account Updated
accountUpdated.description: Your account details have been successfully saved.

errorSavingAiMode.title: Error Saving AI Mode
errorSavingAiMode.description: Could not save AI mode preference.

errorSavingResearchModel.title: Error Saving Research Model
errorSavingResearchModel.description: Could not save research model preference.

userInfo.title: User Information
userInfo.upgradeDescription: Get access to all premium features.

users.title: User Management
users.description: View and manage all registered users.

permissions.title: Manage Role Permissions
permissions.description: Enable or disable features per user role.

errors.edgeFunctionNotFound: Edge Function 'get-all-users' not found. Please deploy the function first.
errors.fetchUsersError: Could not fetch users. Check RLS policies and network.
errors.unknownFetchError: An unknown error occurred while fetching users.

adminUsersPage.noUsersFound: No users found matching the criteria.

deactivateUser.title: Are you sure you want to deactivate {{userName}}?
deactivateUser.description: This action can be undone by reactivating the user.

activateUser.title: Are you sure you want to activate {{userName}}?
activateUser.description: The user will be able to log in again.

newTaskDialog.title: New Task
newTaskDialog.description: Describe what you want to do, and let AI fill in the details.

contactPage.title: Contact Us
contactPage.description: Have a question, suggestion, or found a bug? Let us know!
contactPage.messagePlaceholder: Describe your question, suggestion, or bug as clearly as possible...

notLoggedIn.title: Not logged in
notLoggedIn.description: Please log in to send a message.

messageSent.title: Message Sent
messageSent.description: Thanks for your feedback! We will look into it as soon as possible.

sendFailed.title: Send Failed
sendFailed.defaultError: Could not send the message. Please try again later.

supportPage.paragraph1: Do you have questions or are you experiencing problems with OrgaMaster AI? Contact our support team.
supportPage.paragraph2a: You can reach us via email at:
supportPage.paragraph3: We strive to answer your questions as quickly as possible.

documentationPage.paragraph1: Welcome to the documentation for OrgaMaster AI.
documentationPage.paragraph2: Currently, we are working hard on comprehensive documentation to help you get the most out of the application.
documentationPage.paragraph3: Check back soon for guides, tutorials, and API references.

dashboard.tasksOverview: Here is an overview of your tasks

emptyState.noTasksAfterFilter: No tasks found matching the filters.
emptyState.noTasksAtAll: You don't have any tasks yet.
